amazing! 

I just dont know what to say or where to start! it has EVERYTHING to make a scratchers life better! from dark mode so you wont have fire as eyes, the onion slicing so you won't have anything too choppy, heck! even just the volume slider is great!

absolutely amazing, has all of the features you'd love, dark mode, colors, you can even change your type of editor!
you can put your editor from the right to the left, left to the right,
change block colors
change block types and make them look like 2.0 scratch
amazing,
truly amazing.

It stopped working after like a year. No addons show up and dark mode does not work. Scratch Addons is terrible. I contacted Scratch Addons and switched to a different Scratch customizor until this problem is fixed.
Edit: Chrome keeps saying it may be corrupted. Is this Chrome or the extension's fault? It does not do it in Edge. Most likely it's Chrome. DAMN YOU CHROME!!! CONSPIRACY!!!!===

Really cool extension...have some bugs but it still make the work alot easier...I would appreciate if they make something like a login feature so that we dont have to import data when we switch browsers or something

This is the greatest scratch mod ever and I wish all of these ideas were in real scratch! My favorite features include the pause button, mouse position display, editor find bar, jump to block definition, convert variable to this sprite only, clone counter, running block border, and the debugger panel because these features make it so much easier to find and fix bugs in scratch games! Everyone who uses scratch a lot because not only does it make coding a lot easier, it also improves other aspe... Show more

This might as well be Scratch 4.0 with how many fully customizable features and quality of life improvements this extention adds. From basic fixes that everyone should be using to more specific features for more experienced scratchers, there's absolutely no reason why you shouldn't get this extention!
amazing, was able to switch all my variables to "for this sprite only" and it only took a few seconds, as apposed to the 20 mins it probably would've taken me. pause feature is really great too

This addon for scratch opens many doors, especially when its so easy to get as an extension. All you have to do is click it in your extension toolbar and it works! There are so many options, some which are enabled by default. I recommend this to anyone! [sorry its so big]

I don't know what to even say. This is completely broken every time I've tried to use it in the past few days. It opens, but then the addons don't even exist. There's nothing that it shows me, and no videos tell me how to fix this. I'm probably not re-reviewing until it actually explains how to fix it. It worked before hand and was good, but then all my addons got deleted and I couldn't use it anymore.

If you use scratch a lot. Either to make games, play them, and/or just talking through messages, scratch addons covers all of that. Scratch addons can help you by showing possible glitches like more clones then there should be. There's the 60 FPS button, which can be set to 240 FPS, so if you have a boring un-skippable cutscene, you can go through it 8 times as fast, Scratch addon will notify you whenever you receive a message, so if you are talking with someone, you can do other stuffs while... This extension is a total game changer for Scratch.  Is there a little quirk about the editor that always gets in your way?  Do you hate having to restart your entire project every time you make a change instead of just pausing?  Do you wish that the full screen button actually made the project, you know, full screen?  Well, there's a very good chance that this extension can fix nearly all of those issues!  Without this extension, I'm honestly not sure if I would enjoy using Scratch nearly as... Show more

has tools for the editor that should be in normal scratch. it can show your notification count on the icon, show sprite count, remix trees, onion skins, highlights any block that's running, mouse coordinates, game pause, controller compatibility, just spend some time browsing the features as there is basically everything you always wanted and never knew you always wanted.

(Also, this extension was not made by @griffpatch. It is managed by @World_Languages.
